name: CLRS
description:
--Made in 5 days for the Bevy Game Jam!--

--- CONTROLS ---

-Menu-

[W]-[S] to change selection [A]-[D] to modify settings : Hold shift to change map size faster [Space] to select

-In-Game-

Left click: Place building Right click: Use ability [W]-[S]: Change ability selection [A]-[D]: Change building selection [ESC]: Pause --- ABILITIES ---

Abilities cost 50 ap.

Fortify: A medium area of your color is harder to be converted for a short time. Expand: Spread your color to a small area anywhere on the map.  Nuke: Destroy every color in a large radius anywhere on the map (Affects YOUR colors as well and does NOT affect buildings).

--- BUILDINGS ---

Buildings cost 50 bp; 

[P}: Pulse. Slowly spreads to a large area. [S]: Scatter. Quickly and sporadically spreads to a small area. [L]: Line. Quickly spreads a far distance vertically and horizontally --- CREDITS ---
